name: N-iX
tag_list: it, software, development, nearshore, outsourcing, testing, consulting
overview: N-iX is a Ukrainian IT outsourcing provider of software solutions and engineering services. The company unites over 100 highly qualified professionals located primarily in Lviv, Ukraine. Represented in Germany and Sweden, N-iX carries on activities in Europe focused on Scandinavian market. N-iX acts as an expert in near-shore, consulting Scandinavian companies effectively to operate on the outsourcing model. Highly skilled specialists work as remote departments of the customerâ€™s companies accumulating experience and knowledge of the customerâ€™s standards, requirements and values. â€¢ Integrated/Custom Development â€“ full responsibility for the project throughout its entire life cycle and proven track record in crucial software development areas â€¢ Testing â€“ full complex of activities to monitor and ensure the quality of existing software including software quality consulting, test planning, test execution and reporting, the control of software development processes â€¢ Remote Administration and Consulting â€“ up-and-running service that allows to solve a wide range of system-level issues starting from the particular up to the complete system operation management. N-iX deals with medium to large software vendors. To fit their high requirements to IT solutions, N-iX is competent to offer big units (30 â€“ 50 people) supporting complicated software product (StreamServe), middle size units (10 â€“ 30 people) â€“ Anoto as well as small units (3 â€“ 10 people) â€“ op5 that are unique for each customer.
